1256200.name: G String Sample Soundtrack
1256200.description:
THIS IS A FREE 15-TRACK SAMPLE COMPILATION of the G String OST. I plan on remixing and updating the entire OST for the Ultimate Edition relaunch of the game.

Length: 49.54 min.

All files included are FLAC (lossless) files.

The full G String Original Soundtrack will contain:

128 tracks arranged into a seamless 5 hour and 42 minute long experience.
For convenience the mix has been divided into separate FLAC (lossless) files.

I am only affiliated with and will update/remix the G String OST and G String SAMPLE OST on Steam.

Copyright © Eyaura, 2020-2025.

All Rights Reserved.


Permission is given to use music in this package in any YouTube videos, just credit the author and a link to the game's Steam page is appreciated.
